segments.text: Excuse me , is this the Guyon Travel Agency ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to travel to the ancient town in the south of China . Would you please tell me something about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . There's network of canals . And there are white walls , black tiles , small bridges , flowing rivers , flagstones roads , blue sky and white clouds . Few places have preserved the past like this place . Walking on the ancient road makes us back to our sense .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wonderful . That's just what I expect , where is my first place if I go there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long does the tour take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right . May you have a good trip !
segments.speaker: S2
